name: Demolition Party
description:
Demolition Party is a 4 player PVP car shooter game. Compete to destroy your friendships in the unique collection of maps and guns.

ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play however you want. Demolition Party allows you to play up to 4 player online multiplayer.

TONS OF GUNS

There are tons of guns for "demolish" party and your friendships! :)

UNIQUE MAPS

Compete and fun in unique maps, Don't fall into the lava!

PLAY WITH AI

Don't have enough friends to play with? No worries! Demolition Party offers the option to play with AI opponents. Sharpen your skills, test your strategies, and have a blast while battling against AI-controlled cars.
